Replace.Text: City near Floodable River
A city is placed within 2 tiles of a river that could flood.
The citizens of {CityName} adjust to their new home, and keep a wary eye on the nearby river.
City near Volcano
A city is placed within 2 tiles of a volcano that could erupt.
"We'll be fine," say the citizens of {CityName}. "All mountains smoke a little, right?"
First Resource consumed for Power
Your civilization consumes a resource to generate [ICON_Power] Power for its cities.
Surging machinery and billowing smoke mark the start of our power generation.
First Resource consumed for Power in World
Your civilization is the first in the world to consume a resource to generate Power for its cities.
Rising smoke! Humming machinery! The power of nature has been harnessed by {LOC_GRAMMAR_CIVNAME << {ActingPlayerCivName}} in the cause of power and progress!
Climate Change Phase
CO2 emissions have increased enough to change the world's climate to a more dangerous level.
The world reaches {ClimateChangeName}, causing dire consequences for the global environment.
Canal Completed
You have completed your civilization's first Canal district.
The opening of the {CityName} Canal brings renewed trade and prosperity.
First Tier 4 Government
Your civilization adopts its first Tier 4 Government.
Our people continue to evolve their political system, and attempt the revolutionary new government of {GovernmentType}.
First Tier 4 Government in World
Your civilization is the first to adopt a Tier 4 Government in the world.
The bold people of {LOC_GRAMMAR_CIVNAME << {ActingPlayerCivName}} have developed a new political system of {GovernmentType}, inaugurating a new era of governance!
First Mountain Tunnel
Your civilization builds its first Mountain Tunnel.
Sit down, and let me sing you the ballad about how John Henry dug the first mountain tunnel in {LOC_GRAMMAR_CIVNAME << {ActingPlayerCivName}}.
First Mountain Tunnel in World
Your civilization is the first to build a Mountain Tunnel in the world.
Mountains are no obstacle for the people of {LOC_GRAMMAR_CIVNAME << {ActingPlayerCivName}}, for they are the first in the world to build a tunnel through them.
First Improvement after Natural Disaster
Your civilization builds its first improvement on a tile that was enriched by a natural disaster.
The adaptive people of {LOC_GRAMMAR_CIVNAME << {ActingPlayerCivName}} build after a natural disaster, taking advantage of the renewed land.
First Green Improvement
Your civilization builds its first tile improvement dedicated to providing renewable [ICON_Power] Power.
Now that we have built this {ImprovementType} to produce clean power, perhaps the smog of {CityName} will start to clear.
First Green Improvement in World
Your civilization is the first to build a tile improvement dedicated to providing renewable [ICON_Power] Power in the world.

As the citizens of {LOC_GRAMMAR_CIVNAME << {ActingPlayerCivName}} cheer the opening of their new {ImprovementType} near {CityName}, the sun breaks free from the clouds. Already the skies seem cleaner!
Coastal Flood Mitigated
Your Flood Barrier has prevented catastrophic damage from a coastal flood.
The rising seas pound against the {CityName} Flood Barrier, but the city is safe.
River Flood Mitigated
Your constructed infrastructure has prevented damage from a river flood.
The waters of the {RiverName} rose, but our foresight prevented flooding in the surrounding land.
Diplomatic Victory Resolution Won
You have won the Diplomatic Victory resolution and earned Victory Points.
We have earned the respect of the civilizations of the world, and even our enemies must admit this fact.
Exoplanet Expedition Launched
You have launched your civilization's expedition to a distant planet.
Our expedition to a distant planet leaves orbit, as our people watch with hopeful eyes brimming with tears.
World's First Exoplanet Expedition Launched
You are the first in the world to launch an expedition to a distant planet.
The spaceship from {LOC_GRAMMAR_CIVNAME << {ActingPlayerCivName}} glides from the earth's gravity, on its way to settle a distant world, crowded with people, supplies, and hope.
First Railroad Connection
Your civilization builds its first Railroad to connect two of your cities.
The {CityName} & {OtherCityName} Railroad successfully links our cities.
First Railroad Connection in World
Your civilization is the first to build a Railroad to connect two of its cities in the world.
A hammer drives home a golden spike, a crowd cheers, for the people of {LOC_GRAMMAR_CIVNAME << {ActingPlayerCivName}} have completed the world's first railroad between {CityName} and {OtherCityName}!
First Rock Band Concert
Your civilization performs its first Rock Band concert.
The world-famous band from {LOC_GRAMMAR_CIVNAME << {ActingPlayerCivName}} make their debut to a huge crowd of happy fans.
First Rock Band Concert in World
Your civilization is the first to perform a Rock Band concert in the world.
The huge crowd cheers as the band from {LOC_GRAMMAR_CIVNAME << {ActingPlayerCivName}} take the stage in a concert that will define an age.
World Congress Resolution Bid Won
You have successfully won the bid on a Resolution, and can determine its outcome.
By successfully bidding on a Resolution, we take the first step to power in the World Congress: The capacity to shape the world's priorities.
World Congress Resolution Vote Won Singlehandedly
Despite being the only one to vote for it, your chosen Resolution has made it to the World Congress for consideration.
Our sole vote bringing forward this Resolution shows that our civilization is a truly indispensable member of the World Congress.
Martian Colony Established
You have established a colony on Mars.
Sure, anyone could establish a presence on Mars. But our colony is the best.
World's First Martian Colony Established
You are the first in the world to establish a colony on Mars.
An engineer watches a rocket thunder from the launch pad, carrying the colonists to a new life. "This is really happening," she says. "We're going to Mars."
Your Builders have constructed this unique tile improvement for the first time.

Sky and Stars Golden Age:[NEWLINE]Unlocks the [ICON_TechBoosted] Eurekas for Satellites, Nuclear Fusion, and Nanotechnology if in the Information Era. When chosen in the Future Era the [ICON_TechBoosted] Eurekas for Smart Materials, Predictive Systems, and Offworld Mission are unlocked. +100% XP earned for all Air Units. Aluminum mines accumulate +2 more resources per turn.
Dedication Bonus: Non-Barbarian units killed by Giant Death Robots(+{1_ScoreIncrement} each)
You have destroyed a non-Barbarian unit with a Giant Death Robot.
Automaton Warfare

Automaton Warfare Golden Age:[NEWLINE]Gain a Giant Death Robot in your capital. Receive 3 [ICON_Resource_Uranium] Uranium per turn. [ICON_Resource_Uranium] Uranium mines accumulate +1 more resource per turn.
Automaton Warfare Dedication Bonus:[NEWLINE]Gain +1 Era Score each time you kill a non-Barbarian unit with a Giant Death Robot.
Automaton Warfare Dedication Bonus:[NEWLINE]Gain +1 Era Score each time you kill a non-Barbarian unit with a Giant Death Robot.
